title: Citi Participates in Dominican Republic Conference on Trusts
summary: Santo Domingo - Citi, a global expert in agency and trust services, will play a key role at the 22nd Latin American Trust Conference (COLAFI 2013). Two high-ranking Citi executives, Michael C. Morcom and Omar P. Rashid, will serve as featured speakers and will share their experiences in various markets where the bank operates.
tag-1: Citi Participates in Dominican Republic Conference on Trusts
tag-3: Santo Domingo – Citi, a global expert in agency and trust services, will play a key role at the 22nd Latin American Trust Conference (COLAFI 2013). Two high-ranking Citi executives, Michael C. Morcom and Omar P. Rashid, will serve as featured speakers and will share their experiences in various markets where the bank operates.
tag-4: Morcom, Head of Latin American Agency and Trust Sales, will deliver a talk on "Trust Vehicles in Public Resource Management." Rashid, Securities and Fund Services Head for the Caribbean and Central America, will participate in a panel on "Trusteeships and the Securities Market."
tag-5: According to Dominican Republic Citi Country Officer Máximo Vidal, "COLAFI 2013 represents an excellent opportunity for trust, public sector, corporate and financial counseling professionals to learn more about and remain at the forefront of international market trends."
tag-6: Citi has been authorized by the Dominican Republic's Superintendent of Banking to offer agency and trust services since December 2012. In this capacity, it shares its global knowledge and experience with the local market and executes complex international transactions originating both inside and outside the country, with the same high standards that characterize Citi's global operations.
tag-7: COLAFI 2013 is organized by the Latin American Banking Federation (FELABAN), the Latin American Committee on Trusts and the Dominican Republic's Commercial Banking Association (ABA). The central theme of this year's conference, to be held for the first time at the Barceló Bávaro Palace Deluxe Hotel in Punta Cana on October 16 through 18, is the use of trusts in public resource management.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
